mapper.select: select count(1) from ezs_ezssubstance where ec_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
from ezs_ezssubstance where ec_id = #{content} order by addTime desc LIMIT #{startPos},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from ezs_ezssubstance ee where EXISTS (select 1 from ezs_column ec where ec.parentEzsColumn_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and ee.ec_id = ec.id)

select
from ezs_ezssubstance ee where EXISTS (select 1 from ezs_column ec where ec.parentEzsColumn_id = #{content} and ee.ec_id = ec.id ) order by addTime desc LIMIT #{startPos},#{pageSize}

select
FROM ezs_ezssubstance A WHERE EXISTS (select 1 from ezs_column ec where ec.parentEzsColumn_id = #{catid} and A.ec_id = ec.id ) and A.id < #{id} order by addTime DESC LIMIT 1

select
FROM ezs_ezssubstance A WHERE EXISTS (select 1 from ezs_column ec where ec.parentEzsColumn_id = #{catid} and A.ec_id = ec.id ) and A.id > #{id} order by addTime asc LIMIT 1
